page.title: 02STATISTICS-EPPING GREEN I
page.content: Over half the houses that completed the surveys questionnaire were occupied by only one or two people.There are equal numbers of male or female living in the village.The average (mean)is 38 years 7 months.About 25% of the people living in the village are aged 60 years or over.Just over 27% were under 20 years of age.THe average (mean) time that people had lived in the village was 18.25 years.Just under 10% of the people had lived there more than 50years.43% of people had lived there for lesss than 10 years.There were 4 people living in the village who were over 80 years of age.3 out of the 4 had lived in the vilage for more than 80 years.
